"〔Master Kamits!〕":
"〔Do not be so humble. The future has been
preserved. It was all woven by your efforts.〕"

"〔Though there may be some who have yet to recognize your
achievements, young Rela and I have seen it, and know it all.〕"
"〔Master Kamits〕 〔Even what they've done〕 〔there are still people〕 〔who don't accept〕 〔this one?〕"

"〔It is true. There are those who struggle a great
deal to accept an existence beyond their own.〕"
"〔Though one day, they surely will come around. Though it may take longer than others, they definitely will.〕"
"〔Encounter ARKS〕 〔I as oracle〕 〔will tell the story〕 〔of the birth of the future!〕"

"〔I give you thanks for weaving the threads of the future. I, along
with Rela, will ensure that your efforts pass down through history.〕"
"〔Rela holds a great and heartfelt pride for you and your efforts.〕"

"〔Through her efforts as a guide, she became a bridge between
Dragonkin and ARKS. She's very pleased to achieved such cooperation.〕"
"〔I know〕 〔what cute means!〕 〔Aki said〕 〔she wanted to〕 〔get married〕 〔to someone cute.〕"
"〔Aki and Quna〕 〔taught me lots〕 〔about ARKS culture!〕"
"〔Other Dragonkin also〕 〔are having interest〕 〔in the outside world.〕 〔Dragonkin future〕 〔is bright!〕"

"〔It is as Rela says. From here on, nobody knows
the future. Only that they are inspired by you.〕"

"〔The Dragonkin wish for a future alongside you and yours. Ko Rela, with
you at the center, may the Dragonkin and ARKS become ever closer.〕"
